website_summaries.verdict: Dedicated users have referred to this tanning lotion as a break-through in self-tanners for its easy application, excellent results, and moisturizing formula.
pros: Easy to apply while wet, then wash off in three minutes
Natural glow continues to develop with streak-free results
Formulated with moisturizing sweet almond oil
A truly innovative way to get a sun-free, natural glow
cons: If you don't like the idea of applying while wet, it may not appeal to you
However, you will likely find the results are worth the process

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t smell bad and the only complaint I have is figuring out ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and doesn’t leave you streaky. I noticed a difference the day after I used it. It doesn’t smell bad and the only complaint I have is figuring out what to do for the 3 minutes it is soaking into my skin lol. I definitely will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Gilly C.

customer_reviews.title: Spotty blotches
customer_reviews.text: I am fair skin and tried the lighter version for a week with no impacts- tried the darker color and after 1 application had all sorts of unusual dark spots all over the place- legs, arms etc and def not even. Have a full bottle left and scared to ever try again..
customer_reviews.author: Deborah G.

customer_reviews.title: Will stain everything but your tub/shower tiles.
customer_reviews.text: The before and after difference is negligible compared to the hassle of using the product and the price. The ingredient that makes your skin look tan is better absorbed when your skin is wet, but no matter how careful I tried to be it got on my bath mat, my towels, and even my shower curtain. I once used it two days in a row to deepen the color and it got a bit orangey rather than bronze. Not a total waste of money, but I also won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Correa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for getting a glow before an event
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I don't like using sunless tanners because they smell and stain my sheets, this product does not. I will say to those who are looking to purchase that it is gradual, I didn't see real results until day 4/5 of every day use. One bottle lasted me around 2.5 weeks of everyday use. I do use this for events, but I would probably not use this as an every day thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: New favorite self tanner
customer_reviews.text: I am a pretty fair skinned individual and this product gives me a subtle sun kissed glow. No streaks, no weird orange knuckles or knees, no next day dramatic changes (which I like prefer). Great product. Does not have that gross fake tan smell either so my husband can tolerate it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Was the formulation changed?
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use and no stains. I used this product last summer and it was great. Nice natural glow. However, I bought this one and it did not give me a natural tan like before. I followed all the directions as indicated. Did they change the formulation??
customer_reviews.author: huracan

customer_reviews.title: Fool proof
customer_reviews.text: If you are new to self tanner and you are worried about looking like an oompa loompa look no further. So easy to apply, no way you can mess it up really! Long lasting and even application every time with such a natural color. I am rather white and using this twice makes it look like I have been lounging at the beach for a week holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Tammen

customer_reviews.title: Minimal mess but takes days for the color to come up satisfactorily.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't give as brown a tan, more of a golden, slightly orangeish tan, which I like less well. But I was looking for something that was easier to deal with while traveling so I could get dressed quickly. I found I got color more quickly if I let it sit for 10 minutes before washing it off. I used that time to dry my hair and put on makeup and then rinsed it off (I'd only applied it from the neck down). For that it worked quite well.
customer_reviews.author: nanser

customer_reviews.title: Skip this product, get the spray foam self tanner
customer_reviews.text: If youre hoping to look tan after several days of this product id skip this purchase. You fly through the bottle in a little over 2 weeks. while it does add a little something to your skin it's not enough for anyone to notice except you. After you later up in the shower it needs to sit on your skin for 3 mins with the water off. It's semi inconvenient however it does prevent your palms from looking unnaturally tan. I wouldn't repurchase this product I will however try the spray foam self tanner.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula? Another suspect beauty product on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: See photo. Much lighter in color than last time I purchased. Both were the "medium" tone. The product also comes in a light tone, but as other reviewers have mentioned, even the medium tone is so subtle it almost doesn't make a difference. Makes me think they couldn't sell the light tone product and started filling "medium" bottles with light. This isn't the first time I've received a questionable/possibly fraudulent beauty product on Amazon. Coincidentally, all have been in bottles and containers that are very easy to open and fill with something else. Tired of these shenanigans.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Bummer. It’s such a great & enticing idea. Too bad it doesn’t work. I followed directions exactly and did multiple applications, but I saw NO color. None.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Fincher

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt Work
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, doesnt work Bought the medium and used it at night, saw no results, then i started using twice a day and still no results Only thing that turned color a little was my cuticles and dead skin around my nails Cant even return, what a waste of $$ Maybe its my skin type or something, im very fair skinned, so i was even scared to get too dark, but again, no results!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eli J Dweck

customer_reviews.title: Only a smidge of color after 7 days use
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! I thought it would be great since the regular gradual tanner is excellent. Just thought this would be less messy. After seven consecutive days, I only saw very little coloring. I went by the directions, put it on after I washed, rinsed off and patted dry... Very, very, very little coloring after 7 full days snd only showering once. You're better off buying the regular gradual tanner and a good quality self tanning mitt. This is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great tan extender!
customer_reviews.text: We went to Aruba and came back to the drab winter weather with nice tans. I've been using this stuff every couple of days since and my tan looks better than ever--it deepens and smooths out an existing tan. I even put it on my face. I leave it on for 5 -6 minutes before rinsing. And after rinsing my hands I rub the backs of my hands on my thighs so they will be tan too. Great stuff and no bad smell. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on Amazon because I had bought it precious summer at Ulta, and absolutely loved it. The one I received on Amazon isn't working as well. It wasn't sealed, which I thought was odd. I don't know if I have a past the expiration date bottle, or maybe it got overheated in the delivery process. I love St. Tropez products. I just think I received a bad one. 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Quinn

customer_reviews.title: takes awhile to get color
customer_reviews.text: I like that it gives you a little color in the winter instead of white skin - standing in the shower for 3 minutes with no water running is a little discomforting but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Cinemares

customer_reviews.title: Smells great ... works great!
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful and incredibly easy to use. The only necessary drawback is having to turn off the water and wait for three minutes while the product develops. But it’s hands down worth the wait because, unlike other gradual self tanners, you rinse off the product to reveal silky smooth skin with a instant sun kissed glow!
customer_reviews.author: SincerelyWicked

customer_reviews.title: Allergy
customer_reviews.text: Mixed reviews on this. It did gradually tan my legs a bit, but everytime I used it, I would get a severe ear ache in my left ear....I know, it sounds weird, but I tested it multiple times. So I guess I am allergic to something in the chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like it it just smells a little weird. And it’s kind of hard to leave it on for three minutes without getting in the water. But the product works like it says it does and it isn’t orange or streaky
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Creates a nice glow!
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well and I love that it can be rinsed off after. It doesn’t leave stains on anything (sheets, clothes, etc.) but it doesn’t have a slight smell to it that lingers. It’s better than most in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: cwallick

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the other brand.
customer_reviews.text: No directions telling you how much to use, so I turned orange and the application looked uneven. I wanted a paraben and cruelty free alternative to the Jergen’s, but this isn’t it. The $8 Jergen’s is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Pocono Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It works but not always terribly evenly, but I like the convenience of doing ...
customer_reviews.text: It works but not always terribly evenly, but I like the convenience of doing it in the shower and it is no more streaky than the typical lotions.
customer_reviews.author: jld72

customer_reviews.title: fast service.
customer_reviews.text: Fast service but I'm not thrilled with the product...and I bought two. I just don't like having to stand n the shower for 3 minutes and then rinsing off and I guess I didn't rinse well because I had a streak on the shin of my left leg.
customer_reviews.author: VICKIE BECKER

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: They should stop selling this product. What a joke. Doesn't work whatsoever. Support provided additional instructions to improve results, but still, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Still has same self tan smell
customer_reviews.text: Gave the whole tube a try-does give some color but has the same all day lasting odor as other moisturizing tan lotions. And 3 minutes is a loooong time to stand around wet in the shower! I used it every 2-3 days. Have to be careful around the toes and rub in or it will be streaky. I would suffer through the 3 minutes if it smelled better the rest of the day!
customer_reviews.author: gary onorato

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product. For over a week everyday and had zero results very disappointed don’t buy not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Chris markoe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price imo
customer_reviews.text: Turned me orange. Splotchy. I even had an orange toe where some apparently dropped and I did not notice.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Cant get silpler than this. No orange, no smell and just beautiful natural color. 3 minutes in the shower and rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for this product and followed the instructions exactly. But after using it every day for a week, I still didn't notice any tan.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: I thought this wouldnt smell but it does used as directed and it turned out bad didnt work at all
customer_reviews.author: teresa j wood

customer_reviews.title: Best part is that it’s easy to apply and leave ...
customer_reviews.text: Very subtle brozed glow. Will only work on very fair skin. I can see how some people saw no difference, however I saw a slight bronze on myself. Best part is that it’s easy to apply and leave no streaks!
customer_reviews.author: MARTA

customer_reviews.title: In showe skin tanner
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see the difference in my skin color at all. You have to apply in shower and let it soak in for 3 minutes before rinsing off. —waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B

customer_reviews.title: Hardly a difference
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t make you darker. It adds a slight olive tint if you’re cooler toned but it won’t make you look tan. Can’t imagine using the lighter color
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this “formulation “. The original mousse is fantastic... This is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I used for 6 days and notice nothing different. A waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Terry Krengle

customer_reviews.title: No color, doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. Have used this exactly as directed and no color
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C. Dahl

customer_reviews.title: No orange!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t turn my skin orange. It’s a slower process, but nice frangrance.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie from Nebraska

customer_reviews.title: Zero results
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product. I used exactly as directed and to no avail. I saw absolutely no difference in tone. Don't waste the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla S

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner out there.  Bar none
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it’s only a 3 minute process and done IN THE SHOWER. No more feeling sticky for hours while waiting for a self tanner to “sink in”. Perfect golden bronze tan. Everyone thinks I’ve been on a tropical vacation when I’m using
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. I read the reviews and read that the light doesn’t work so I purchased the darker shade. That didn’t work either!
customer_reviews.author: lisa edwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good way to get a tan slowly. No smears or different coloured areas. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have much effect
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to do much tanning and was a pain to stand around for 3 mins in the shower, letting it sit on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Summary
customer_reviews.text: Not much color I may have needed the darker version
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no difference
customer_reviews.text: I did not tan using this product. It is def overrated.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely don't expect to get the deep color you get from one use of the St. Tropez foam with the first use, but I actually love this product. It leaves you with a really nice subtle glow, and the shade is a soft beige rather than orange-y. Quick and easy to apply, no streaks or splotches. No lingering scent or stain risk to your clothing or sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pale and this gives me a beautiful warm tan.
customer_reviews.author: Godschild

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works well-very light color and need to use every day, but pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Geep

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes several uses to notice a color change. The scent it tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Test skin first
customer_reviews.text: Made skin completely break out in horrible rash. Lasted for days. I’ve used many times before but this bottle made me scared to try again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Looking Tan
customer_reviews.text: Quick results and easy to use, even on face. Streak free too!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I love all my st. Tropez products but this one. It does not work at all. I thought it would save time but it is more of an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Grote

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love that it made me tan but not too tan, easy to use
customer_reviews.author: annabel

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really work very well. It was not easy to use. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Amber Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. Its pretty expensive, but definately worth it if you are pasty white and just looking for a healthy glow.
customer_reviews.author: m. marsh

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work. Used it for 2 weeks and ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. Used it for 2 weeks and literally nothing. No tan at all
customer_reviews.author: Rodney  Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different self tanners and this is by far my favorite!! Its nice that you wash it off in the shower because you dont have to worry about it staining your clothes or anything else, and you do not feel sticky afterwards. I find that it is easier to get even coverage with this product because you put it on while your skin is moist. It has a nice smell as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. No color change after using It everyday for a week.
customer_reviews.author: LCZ

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I definitely prefer using a self tanner in the shower as opposed to a lotion after. It's not as effective as a lotion though. Overall, I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. I got more color using jergens gradual tanner than this. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Velysity Butuso

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed, I am a very pale person and it did not change my skin pigmentation at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Conner

customer_reviews.title: Every Company Makes Mistakes, Right?
customer_reviews.text: Even as a gradual tanner, this product does not perform well. The amount of product used does not amount to the price you pay. If you do insist on purchasing, I would recommend using this to extend the sunless tan you've already achieved from a separate St. Tropez (or like) product. Pros: can be used as a tan extender, moisturizes skin, quality color Cons: not enough product for the price paid, takes many applications to even begin noticing a difference, strong smell (not the best; not the worst)
customer_reviews.author: Jake Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a fan of waiting 2 mins especially for minimal effect.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Leukemia survivor & can not be out in sun. Miss being able to even spray tan ( not allowed) .Did a lot of reviewing of products. This one stood out so I gave it a try. I LOVE IT!!! I feel it's a must try!! Love the way it makes my skin feel to. The smell is very faint. Most important, my husband likes how my skin looks to! TRY IT!!! Sorry I didn't take pix. I was very pale but now I AM NOT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: T Clement

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very even tan, wait time is annoying but prevents rub off on clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! And the tan lasts for days! And looks very natural! Extremely happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Simplify

customer_reviews.title: Do not use if you have any sensitivity to sunless ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not use if you have any sensitivity to sunless tanner. Took over a week for all the itching and spots to go away from one application.
customer_reviews.author: L. Moran

customer_reviews.title: I hoped. I dreamed. I really wanted it to work, but...
customer_reviews.text: ...it doesn't do anything. I should've known that a self-tanner you rinse off after 3 minutes wouldn't have any effect whatsoever. C'est la vie...
customer_reviews.author: Barkley

customer_reviews.title: This body wash doesn’t have the best smell, once it starts to lather the smell ...
customer_reviews.text: This body wash doesn’t have the best smell, once it starts to lather the smell seems to get a little better but definitely smells like a tanning bed. I am using this product in conjunction with the 4 in 1 tan, tone, firm, and moisturize by St. Tropez as well. I will update on the tanning effect after 2 weeks of using the product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: 3 minutes waiting in the shower seems like forever. Product does work.
customer_reviews.author: Barcelona Girl

customer_reviews.title: Slowww Color
customer_reviews.text: Good, but doesn't have enough color fast enough. Jergens is better ;)))
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: didnt even use it. im a guy and the smell was overbearing. i couldnt stand the small the minute i opened the bottle. i was scared that smell would stick on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful and Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: You have to stand there for 3 minutes before rinsing. Nobody has time for that. However, I tried it. I got absolutely *no* color from it. It was a waste of money and not eligible for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: A Burnikel

customer_reviews.title: If putting it on makes you feel better after or the next day
customer_reviews.text: Definitely nothing dramatic. I think more so than not this product works psychologically. If putting it on makes you feel better after or the next day, making you think you look darker so you walk with more confidence, then by all means, this may be the product for you. It's not like Bondi Sands or anything that really gives you color. I used this with my summer tan so I couldn't tell a difference. May try again when I'm super white. I think a drop got on my foot accidentally and the next day I saw a spot so I guess it does do something to some degree. -shrugs-
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not deliver what it promises.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. I have not seen any "golden" color being developed after 5 uses. I have a fair skin. I used it as directed. Do not waste your money. Unfortunately it says that this item can not be returned back to Amazon, so $30 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, my daughter was pretty excited to know that she can use in the shower. will have to let you know how it works when that happens but I'm happy that she thought it was cool.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: I got this product in (different version) my Birchbox last year. The color I got from it was awesome! I figured that the medium would give me a darker color since I have Italian olive skin. This has given me absolutely no color and I've put on 3 days in a row. Either I got a defective product or this one just sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Get for hydrating skin. Not much of that self tanner smell. It's a bit tricky to be in the shower wash up, turn off water, sit or stand for 3 minutes and wash off...I get cold but is a great time to massage the conditioner in your hair.
customer_reviews.author: K.Cass

product_meta.title: St. Tropez Gradual Tan In Shower Lotion Golden Glow, Medium, 6.7 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
St. Tropez Gradual Tan In Shower Lotion Golden Glow Medium

BRAND STORY
With one St.Tropez spray tan performed every minute and one product sold every eight seconds, St.Tropez is proud to be the leading premium tanning brand chosen globally by professionals, celebrities and beauty editors alike.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
